css:
/*by tazzan Brad*/        
     
/* Start http://www.cursors-4u.com */ body, a:hover {cursor: url(https://png.icons8.com/metro/1600/cursor.png), url(https://png.icons8.com/metro/1600/cursor.png), progress !important;} /* End http://www.cursors-4u.com */
